price: 15. (Al-lah les dijo:) “Los libraremos de este castigo por un tiempo, pero volverán (a rechazar la verdad).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
